original_text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment, for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment, and the rent is made worse.
korean_text: 생베 조각을 낡은 옷에 붙이는 자가 없나니 이는 기운 것이 그 옷을 당기어 해어짐이 더하게 됨이요

sentences.original_text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람도 새 천 조각을 넣지 않는다

sentences.original_text: for that which is put in to fill it up
and the rent is made worse
